title: Mike Tyson and Miley Cyrus 'attending Logan Paul and KSI fight' says Ben Phillips
text:
Ben suggested Mike Tyson and Miley Cyrus might be making an appearance (Pictures: Rex/Getty)

Logan Paul and KSI’s highly-anticipated rematch is set to see some famous faces picking a side, with Justin Bieber already confirmed as attending.

However, according to Logan’s pal and fellow YouTuber Ben Phillips, he might not be the only recognisable face in the crowd.

‘I feel like there’s all sorts of rumours going on, obviously people are gonna turn up,’ Ben told Metro.co.uk. ‘Mike Tyson might be turning up as well.’

The 27-year-old added: ‘Justin Bieber is going to be there, there’s all sorts of rumours going on!

Ben and Logan have been friends ‘through thick and thin’ (Picture: Ben Phillips)

‘I know that Jonathan Cheban, the Food God, Kim Kardashian’s best friend is going to be there as well and, who knows, maybe Jon will bring Kim along for a laugh?’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Admitting that the rumour mill has definitely been churning, Ben went on to say: ‘Some were saying Miley Cyrus is going to turn up!’

We’ll be keeping our eyes peeled.

Although he was forced to pull out of attending the London press conference due to some terrifying threats, Ben has made it clear he’s backing his pal Logan

‘Me and Logan have been friends for a while…we stuck together through thick and thin,’ he explained.

However, it’s not just the friendship that has him convinced of Logan’s victory.

The pair will take to the ring on 9 November (Picture: Getty Images)

‘If I was standing outside of the box, it’s kind of a no-brainer,’ he said. ‘Logan’s a physically stronger person in this fight. He’s got a lot more beef around him, a lot more muscle around him.’

Making sure to send a bit of shade KSI’s way, he added: ‘He’s at the point where he’s been training non-stop since the last match, not taking dips out for terrible music tours.’

Justin is confirmed for the fight (Picture: GC Images)

Ouch.

Logan and KSI are set to take to the Staples Center in Los Angeles on 9 November after their last match ended in a draw.

Meanwhile, the American star has warned his friends and family to stay away from Biebs during the match, saying on his podcast Impaulsive: ‘By the way, if anyone in my family and friends section asks Bieber for a picture, I am kicking you the f*** out. Just leave the kid alone.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I just want to promise him sanctity and safety and entertainment.’

Ben Phillips has launched new podcast BROCAST with new episodes available every Thursday at 5pm on YouTube, Spotify and Apple Music.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: YouTuber Ben Phillips suggests Mike Tyson and Miley Cyrus will be attending KSI and Logan Paul fight after Justin Bieber confirmed.
